tuv.seg: client_notify_sms_suspension_warning_body

Dear %name%:
Balance at your account is insufficient to cover next billing period. Despite of several notifications no funds have been added to your account. If amount due is not paid within 24 yours, the service will be automatically suspended. To avoid suspension of service, we strongly recommend you to make a deposit immediately.
Your current balance: %current_balance% CHF Required additional deposit: %dept% CHF
Please follow the link below to enter your account:
%partner_site_url%
We hope to continue our cooperation in the future!
We would like to remind you that our customer support is glad to assist you 24/7. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or concerns.
Best Regards, %partner_site_name%.

Notification from %partner_site_name%.
Service will be suspended within 24 hours. Current balance: %current_balance% CHF. Amount required to avoid suspension: %dept% CHF.

Benachrichtigung aus %partner_site_name%.
Dienst wird innerhalb von 24 Stunden ausgesetzt werden. Aktuell Guthaben: %current_balance% CHF. Betrag erforderlich, die Aussetzung zu vermeiden: %dept% CHF.

Notification from %partner_site_name%.
Service will be suspended within 24 hours. Current balance: %current_balance% CHF. Amount required to avoid suspension: %dept% CHF.

Notification from %partner_site_name%.
Service will be suspended within 24 hours. Current balance: %current_balance% CHF. Amount required to avoid suspension: %dept% CHF.

Notification from %partner_site_name%.
Service will be suspended within 24 hours. Current balance: %current_balance% CHF. Amount required to avoid suspension: %dept% CHF.

Notification from %partner_site_name%.
Service will be suspended within 24 hours. Current balance: %current_balance% CHF. Amount required to avoid suspension: %dept% CHF.
client_notify_sms_balance_insufficient_body

Dear %name%:
This is a reminder that you have insufficient funds to cover next payment. The amount due in the next billing period is %order_total_amount% CHF.
Your current balance: %current_balance% CHF Required additional deposit: %dept% CHF
Please, follow this link to enter your account.
%partner_site_url%
We look forward for a timely deposit and hope to continue our beneficial cooperation.
We would like to remind you that our customer support is glad to assist you 24/7! Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or concerns.
Best Regards, %partner_site_name%.

Notification from %partner_site_name%.
Insufficient balance for service renewal. Current balance: %current_balance% CHF. Recharge your account by: %dept% CHF.
Thank you in advance for timely payment.

Benachrichtigung aus %partner_site_name%.
Unzureichend Guthaben für Dienst-Wiederherstellung. Aktuell Guthaben: %current_balance% CHF. Laden Sie Ihr Konto nach von: %dept% CHF.
Vielen Dank im Voraus für die rechtzeitige Zahlung.

Notification from %partner_site_name%.
Insufficient balance for service renewal. Current balance: %current_balance% CHF. Recharge your account by: %dept% CHF.
Thank you in advance for timely payment.

client_notify_sms_suspension_body

Dear %name%:
Your order(s) has been suspended because of insufficient balance:
Order(s): %order_list%
Best Regards, %partner_site_name%.

Notification from %partner_site_name%.
The following service/s has been suspended for non-payment.
Service list:
%order_list%
To resume service recharge your account.

Benachrichtigung aus %partner_site_name%.
Folgende Leistung(en) ist für Nicht-Zahlung ausgesetzt worden.
Dienst Liste:
%order_list%
Um den Dienst wieder aufzunehmen, laden Sie Ihr Konto nach.

To resume service recharge your account.
